item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

you could lock the minimap and make it so they cant click by opeinging a non closeable interface if their jailed…
they can still tele around but they cant exactly play with comfort lol

or you can teleblock them and add the “magical force stops you from moveing”

item.title: Jail Command! REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @ChaseScapes ChaseScapes
item.description:
@ChaseScapes wrote:

I put String otherPName = command.substring(6); it gives me no errors but I don’t work.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 02:42:48 PM[/size][hr]Well it work’d but when they get teleyed there screen is black, how do I fix? The location is right…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 02:48:19 PM[/size][hr]

Alright I got jail to work, but one problem how do I make it where it can stop the user sent to jail from saying a command, intill another command is said…

like when I say ::SendToJail, then it needs to block people from say ::home to get out…

Read full topic

item.title: Jail Command! REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @puppy_boy puppy boy
item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

String otherPName = command.substring(10);
should be
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
cause
wen it looks for the name with the one you have “xjail bobby”
it finds “y”
but with 6 it starts at the 6th char ands find the correct name

Read full topic

item.title: Jail Command! REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @ChaseScapes ChaseScapes
item.description:
@ChaseScapes wrote:

I have this code right now, and It does not work, does anyone wanna help me out?! Reward!!!

if (command.startsWith("xjail") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = 2802; p.teleportToY = 2183; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }

Read full topic
